<intent_context>
  <intent_id>INT-001</intent_id>
  <name>Build Weather API Integration</name>
  <description>Implement a new Weather API service that fetches data from OpenWeatherMap. Should include a service class and unit tests.
</description>
  <status>IN_PROGRESS</status>
  <authorized_scope>
    <pattern>src/services/weather/**</pattern>
    <pattern>tests/weather/**</pattern>
    <pattern>src/index.ts</pattern>
  </authorized_scope>
  <constraints>
    <constraint>Must use Axios for HTTP requests</constraint>
    <constraint>Must not leak API keys (use process.env)</constraint>
    <constraint>All methods must be asynchronous</constraint>
  </constraints>
  <acceptance_criteria>
    <criterion>WeatherService.getForecast() returns typed JSON</criterion>
    <criterion>Unit tests achieve > 80% coverage</criterion>
  </acceptance_criteria>
  <recent_trace_history count="0" />
</intent_context>
